text.p: Consider the vector [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] in [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline] shown below.
Which of the following statements is true of the list [mathjaxinline]L = \{ v\}[/mathjaxinline]?

choice.text: [mathjaxinline]L[/mathjaxinline] is a basis of some subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline], but not of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline] itself
[mathjaxinline]L[/mathjaxinline] is not a basis of any subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^2[/mathjaxinline]
